title: [Large-Scale] Online Tutorial Redesign Process for Improving Information Literacy in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic research skills and comprehension of scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Requires strengthened evaluation and application skills for scientific/technological academic resources, with demands for real-time interaction and project-based feedback

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible scientific information sources in academic databases with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply a 5-step verification process to assess the credibility of academic sources and write reports accordingly
Learners can propose information ethics compliance measures when writing scientific experiment reports by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
